standing_shoulder_press.name: Standing Dumbbell Shoulder Press
standing_shoulder_press.description: Targets shoulders. Push dumbbells overhead in a controlled motion.

overhead_press.name: Barbell Overhead Press
overhead_press.description: Targets shoulders. Press barbell overhead, keeping core tight.

lateral_raises.name: Lateral Raises
lateral_raises.description: Targets shoulders. Raise dumbbells out to the sides until parallel to the ground.

cable_face_pulls.name: Cable Face Pulls
cable_face_pulls.description: Targets rear delts and upper back. Pull rope towards face, keeping elbows high.

reverse_fly.name: Bent Over Dumbbell Reverse Fly
reverse_fly.description: Strengthening the rear delts by using the bent over rear delt fly can lead to improved posture and a greater level of strength on other lifts.

seated_shoulder_press.name: Seated Dumbbell Press
seated_shoulder_press.description: Utilizing dumbbells as opposed to performing with a barbell will allow the individual to strengthen each side of the muscle equally.

seated_arnold_press.name: Seated Arnold Press
seated_arnold_press.description: The seated Arnold press is a variation of the seated dumbbell press and an exercise utilized to build shoulder muscle size and strength.

reverse_cable_crossover.name: Reverse Cable Crossover
reverse_cable_crossover.description: Cross your hands in front with cables. pull them all the way to the bottom.

shoulder_shrugs.name: Shoulder Shrugs
shoulder_shrugs.description: Shoulder Shrugs is an exercise where you lift your shoulders straight up towards your ears, holding a weight in each hand.

leg_press.name: Leg Press
leg_press.description: Targets quadriceps and glutes. Push the platform away from you.

squats.name: Barbell Squats
squats.description: Compound exercise for lower body. Keep your back straight, descend until thighs are parallel to the floor.

bicep_curls.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
bicep_curls.description: Isolate the biceps. Keep elbows tucked in and curl dumbbells towards shoulders.

tricep_extensions.name: Overhead Tricep Extensions
tricep_extensions.description: Targets triceps. Extend dumbbells overhead, keeping elbows close to head.

crunches.name: Crunches
crunches.description: Targets upper abs. Lift shoulders off the floor, engaging core.

plank.name: Plank
plank.description: Core stability exercise. Maintain a straight line from head to heels.

bench_press.name: Barbell Bench Press
bench_press.description: Targets chest, shoulders, triceps. Lower barbell to mid-chest, then push up.

deadlifts.name: Barbell Deadlifts
deadlifts.description: Full body exercise. Lift barbell from the floor, keeping back straight, and stand up.

rows.name: Bent-Over Rows
rows.description: Targets back. Bend at hips, pull barbell towards lower chest, squeezing shoulder blades.

cable_kickbacks.name: Cable Kickbacks
cable_kickbacks.description: Targets glutes and hamstrings. Attach ankle strap to cable, kick leg back and up, squeezing glutes.

cable_pull_throughs.name: Cable Pull-Throughs
cable_pull_throughs.description: Targets glutes and hamstrings. Stand facing away from cable, pull handle between legs, driving hips forward.

cable_crunches.name: Cable Crunches
cable_crunches.description: Targets abs. Kneel facing cable, hold rope behind head, crunch down, engaging core.

cable_wood_chops.name: Cable Wood Chops
cable_wood_chops.description: Targets obliques and core. Stand sideways to cable, pull handle across body in a chopping motion.

cable_chest_flyes.name: Cable Chest Flyes
cable_chest_flyes.description: Targets chest. Stand in center of cable machine, bring handles together in a 'hugging' motion.

cable_tricep_pushdowns.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
cable_tricep_pushdowns.description: Targets triceps. Stand facing cable, push bar down towards thighs, fully extending arms.

cable_bicep_curls.name: Cable Bicep Curls
cable_bicep_curls.description: Targets biceps. Stand facing cable, curl bar towards shoulders, squeezing biceps.

cable_seated_rows.name: Cable Seated Rows
cable_seated_rows.description: Targets back. Sit on bench, pull handle towards lower abdomen, squeezing shoulder blades.

cable_lat_pulldowns.name: Cable Lat Pulldowns
cable_lat_pulldowns.description: Targets lats. Sit on bench, pull bar down to upper chest, squeezing shoulder blades.

rope_waves.name: Rope Waves
rope_waves.description: Full body cardio exercise with battle ropes. Create alternating waves with both arms.

rope_slams.name: Rope Slams
rope_slams.description: Explosive movement with battle ropes. Slam both ropes down simultaneously.

rope_spirals.name: Rope Spirals
rope_spirals.description: Core-focused battle rope exercise. Create spiral motions with alternating arms.
